definitions.text: a formal and solemn declaration of objection
examples: they finished the game under protest to the league president
the senator rose to register his protest
the many protestations did not stay the execution

definitions.text: the act of protesting; a public (often organized) manifestation of dissent
the act of making a strong public expression of disagreement and disapproval
examples: he shouted his protests at the umpire
a shower of protest was heard from the rear of the hall

definitions.text: express opposition through action or words
examples: dissent to the laws of the country

definitions.text: affirm or avow formally or solemnly
